titleStmt.title: The Christians defense against the fears of death with seasonable directions how to prepare our selves to dye well / written originally in French by Char. Drelincourt ; and translated into English by M. D'Assigny.
titleStmt.author: Drelincourt, Charles, 1595-1669.
D'Assigny, Marius, 1643-1717.
